title: [Your first name] the Hedgehog
body:
I remember this forum game from old GD, lets get this restarted!

1: Go to Google image search
2: Type [your first name] the Hedgehog (Steven the Hedgehog, in my case)
3: Search
4: Post the first image.

http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140805191455/le-miiverse-resource/images/f/fa/Steven_the_hedgehog_by_naruto_21-d34ao9g.jpg

God help us all.
